scripts.compile: php build/build_data.php && php build/build_php.php > lib/lib_timezones.php && php build/build_js.php > lib/lib_timezones.js
scripts.js-uglify: echo "/* $(npm -s run env echo '$npm_package_name') $(date +%Y-%m-%d) */" > lib/lib_timezones.min.js; ./node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs -c -m -- lib/lib_timezones.js >> lib/lib_timezones.min.js
scripts.test: npm run js-test && npm run php-test
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run js-uglify && npm run test && npm run coverage
